title: Get your colors straight
author: VD
content_html:
Oh, and RED states are DEMOCRATIC states. I’m no Republican, but I do not accept this hide-the-socialist nonsense that the mainstream media is trying to foist upon us.

RED the blood of angry men

BLUE the Bush family bloodlines

RED the eyes of Michael Moore

BLUE cigars, women and wines





Oh, George Soros, what’s wrong with you today? You look as if you’ve seen a ghost….

A ghost you say? A ghost maybe. He was just like a ghost, Kerry. One exit poll and he was gone!

RED the leftist rage burns higher

BLUE the youth vote wasn’t there

RED McAuliffe was a liar

BLUE the world is so unfair!
content_text:
Oh, and RED states are DEMOCRATIC states.  I’m no Republican, but I do not accept this hide-the-socialist nonsense that the mainstream media is trying to foist upon us.

Oh, George Soros, what’s wrong with you today? You look as if you’ve seen a ghost….
A ghost you say?  A ghost maybe.  He was just like a ghost, Kerry.  One exit poll and he was gone!
